body:
I checked with brakeman and also fixed 2 other minor things. Brakeman also found a few unscoped calls to the `find` method of models, but I think in those cases it is okay to do them. 

There are two things marked as `high` that I am not sure if and how we want to fix them: 

The `AttendancesController` has redirect_to's to an url you can define in the parameter (see why it warns about them [here](http://brakemanscanner.org/docs/warning_types/redirect/) ). Ideally we would check if the redirect_to is not going to another site using a fixed list of domains or check if the urls are only relative and not absolute.
